description.en: The basics of gemmology are introduced. Identification of different stones and use of necessary instruments. Magnifying glass and its use. An overview of stone cutting types, quality assessment and maintenance.
description.et: Tutvustatakse kiviõpetuse aluseid. Erinevate kivide identifitseerimine ja selleks vajalike instrumentide kasutamine. Luup ja selle kasutamine. Ülevaate andmine kivide lihvitüüpides, kvaliteedi hindamisest ja hooldamisest

objectives.en: To provide general knowledge of stones and minerals, their characteristics and determination methods.
objectives.et: Anda üldteadmised kivimitest ja mineraalidest, nende omadustest ja määramisviisidest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the subject, the student:
- have familiarized themselves with the properties of various stones and minerals;
learning_outcomes.et: - on tutvunud erinevate kivimite ja mineraalide omadustega;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to use suitable tools for determining stones;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kasutada kivimite määramiseks sobivaid abivahendeid;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how and with which tools to determine stones;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab, kuidas ja milliste vahendite abil määrata kivimeid;

learning_outcomes.en: - has an overview of the cut types of gemstones;
- knows how to evaluate the quality of stones and how to choose them for professional work;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab, mille järgi hinnata kivide kvaliteeti ning mille järgi neid erialaseks tööks valida;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to care for different gemstones.
